meanings.sent1: I need to desand my shoes after walking on the beach.
meanings.sent2: The workers will desand the playground before the children arrive.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to desand the litter box by kicking the sand everywhere.
meanings.sent4: She carefully desanded the seashells to display them in her collection.
meanings.sent5: The gardener used a sieve to desand the soil for the new plants.

meanings.sent1: The desand of the beach revealed colorful seashells underneath.
meanings.sent2: After the desand, the playground was ready for the kids to play.
meanings.sent3: The desand process at the construction site was noisy but necessary.
meanings.sent4: The desand of the hourglass symbolized the passing of time.
meanings.sent5: The desand of the sandbox left the children with clean hands.
